metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15605 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HTTP request smuggling in Node.js 10, 12, and 13 causes malicious payload delivery when transfer-encoding is malformed

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15605` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nodejs - 4.2.6~dfsg-1ubuntu4.2+esm2
nodejs-legacy - 4.2.6~dfsg-1ubuntu4.2+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nodejs package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.2.6~dfsg-1ubuntu4.2+esm2').
